Posts.Content: My husband has just started treatment and Xeloda is one of the drugs he is taking. May I ask what the problems are you have had? So far so good with him, but then it is very early days as he is on the first cycle of treatment.
Posts.Title: Xeloda

Posts.Content: Thank you Sitka, so glad it worked well for you and I hope the loss of balance sorts itself out for you. I guess we none of us have any option but to hope for the best and go with the drugs offered, at least if he doesn't lose his hair that will be a great comfort to him - daft but it's one thing that he really dreaded as he has always been very concious of his hair and never has it cut very short. Good luck to you and thank you again.
